text:
FinFolio - Denver, CO (DTC)

FinFolio builds portfolio management software for large professional wealth managers. Currently hiring C#/WPF/SQL stack developers. Immediate openings for two entry level (or a few years experience) developers. We are looking for smart, capable people. Fun company, great office with foosball, video games, big monitors, Aeron chairs, free soda, etc.

More info here: http://www.finfolio.com/aboutus/Pages/Entry-level-C-SQL-WPF-...

Email a resume to me (founder/CEO) mattabar (at) finfolio.com.
